amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers from removing privately owned cabins on privately owned land at Lake Kemp for an additional 5 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
